alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 11:46AM EST until January 13 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. The snow will likely be heavy and wet. * WHERE...Central Somerset, Northern Franklin, and Northern Oxford Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...A fast moving system will bring a period of moderate heavy snowfall to the region today. Travel will be impacted due to snowfall accumulations on untreated roads. Periods of moderate and heavy snow will combine with low visibility to create dangerous driving conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Central Somerset; Northern Franklin; Northern Oxford
